customer_addr:

7425 Baker Rd

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15 pm on
22-Nov-16.
On October 31, 2016, Mr. Fisher indicated his optimal hours for inspection are Tuesdays and Thursdays. However,
no one is home at the facility today. I called and left messages on both the home and business phone lines, then
waited for one half hour, but received no return call and no one returned home.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15 pm on
22-Nov-16.
On October 31, 2016, Mr. Fisher indicated his optimal hours for inspection are Tuesdays and Thursdays.  However,
no one is home at the facility today.  I called and left messages on both the home and business phone lines, then
waited for one half hour, but received no return call and no one returned home.
